welcomeSubMessage: Your AI-powered intelligent study assistant. Explore the tools to enhance your learning.
cardBooksDesc: Access your digital books and study content
cardSummaryDesc: Generate summaries and key points to study efficiently
cardMapDesc: Visualize connections between concepts to improve your understanding
cardQuizDesc: Generate personalized study quizzes with questions and answers
cardEvalDesc: Test your knowledge with automatically generated questions
digitalLibrarySub: Access your collection of digital books to study and review academic content.
summaryPageSub: Simplify complex topics with AI-generated summaries to facilitate your understanding and study.
summaryNoKeyPointsGenerated: No key points were generated for this summary.
mapPageSub: Visualize relationships between concepts and strengthen your understanding with personalized concept maps.
quizPageSub: Generate personalized tests to evaluate your understanding and reinforce learning.
quizTopicPlaceholder: Write the topic for the quiz
quizBookContentPlaceholderOptional: Paste relevant book text here (optional for more specific quiz)
evalPageSub: Test your understanding of the topic with automatically generated questions.
profilePersonalSub: Here you can see your progress and manage your account.
historySub: See your progress! Every evaluation makes you stronger ðŸ”¥
helpPageSub: Here you will find answers to frequently asked questions you may have as a Student.
faq1_q: How to register for your Student account?
faq1_a: To register, simply go to the main page and click the 'Sign Up' button. Follow the steps to create your account.
faq2_a: Navigate through the tabs to discover tools like the summary generator, quizzes, and mind maps.
faq3_a: Currently, course selection is a sample feature. In the future, you will be able to enroll in specific courses.
faq4_a: Customizing schedules and viewing detailed grades are under development and will be available soon.
faq5_q: How to explore materials and resources?
faq5_a: Go to the 'Books' tab to access the available study materials.
faq6_a: Many of our tools, like the summary generator, allow you to paste text directly for processing.
faq7_q: Working in a team is fun
faq7_a: Collaborative features are in our future plans. Stay tuned for updates!
faq8_q: What features does the application offer for learning?
faq8_a: SMART STUDENT offers smart summaries, auto-generated quizzes, mind maps, evaluations, and a profile to track your progress.
faqNotFound: Didn't find what you were looking for?
